file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 2.0.0
  title: World Bank Data API
  description: >
    This is a generated connector from [World Bank API v2](https://datahelpdesk.worldbank.org/knowledgebase/articles/889392-about-the-indicators-api-documentation) OpenAPI Specification. 

    The World Bank Indicators API provides access to nearly 16,000 time series indicators. Most of these indicators are available online through tools such as `Databank` and the `Open Data` website. The API provides programmatic access to this same data. Many data series date back over 50 years, and can be used to create interesting applications.
  x-ballerina-display:
    label: World Bank
    iconPath: "icon.png"
  x-ballerina-init-description: >
    The connector initialization doesn't require setting the API credentials.
servers:
  - description: Indicators represent data like total population, gross domestic product, energy use, and many more
    url: http://api.worldbank.org/v2/
paths:
  /country/all/indicator/SP.POP.TOTL:
    get:
      tags: ["Population", "Total", "World"]
      description: "Get population of each country"
      operationId: getPopulation
      x-ballerina-display:
        label: "Get Population"
      parameters:
        - name: date
          in: query
          description: "Date-range by year, month or quarter that scopes the result-set."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: "2010"
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Date"
        - name: format
          in: query
          description: "Format of the response."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: json
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Response Format"
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: "Page number"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Page Number"
        - name: per_page
          in: query
          description: "Per page record count"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 50
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Per Page Record Count"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Population of each countries"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/WorldBankResponse"

  /country/{country_code}/indicator/SP.POP.TOTL:
    get:
      tags: ["Population", "Total", "Country"]
      description: "Get population of a country"
      operationId: getPopulationByCountry
      x-ballerina-display:
        label: "Get Country Population"
      parameters:
        - name: country_code
          in: path
          description: "Country code (Example- AFG, ALB, LKA)"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Country Code"
        - name: date
          in: query
          description: "Date-range by year, month or quarter that scopes the result-set."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: "2010"
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Date"
        - name: format
          in: query
          description: "Format of the response."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: json
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Response Format"
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: "Page number"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Page Number"
        - name: per_page
          in: query
          description: "Per page record count"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 50
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Per Page Record Count"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Yearly population of the given country"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/WorldBankResponse"

  /country/all/indicator/NY.GDP.MKTP.CD:
    get:
      tags: ["GDP", "All Countries"]
      description: "Get GDP of each country."
      operationId: getGDP
      x-ballerina-display:
        label: "Get GDP"
      parameters:
        - name: date
          in: query
          description: "Date-range by year, month or quarter that scopes the result-set."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: "2010"
          x-displya:
            label: Date
        - name: format
          in: query
          description: "Format of the response."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: json
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Response Format"
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: "Page number"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Page Number"
        - name: per_page
          in: query
          description: "Per page record count"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 50
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Per Page Record Count"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "GDP of each country"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/WorldBankResponse"

  /country/{country_code}/indicator/NY.GDP.MKTP.CD:
    get:
      tags: ["GDP data of a given country"]
      description: "Get GDP of a country."
      operationId: getGDPByCountry
      x-ballerina-display:
        label: "Get GDP By Country"
      parameters:
        - name: country_code
          in: path
          description: "Country code (Example- AFG, ALB, LKA)"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: Country Code
        - name: date
          in: query
          description: "Date-range by year, month or quarter that scopes the result-set."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: "2010"
          x-displya:
            label: Date
        - name: format
          in: query
          description: "Format of the response."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: json
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Response Format"
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: "Page number"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Page Number"
        - name: per_page
          in: query
          description: "Per page record count"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 50
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Per Page Record Count"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Yearly GDP of the given country"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/WorldBankResponse"

  /country/all/indicator/1.1_ACCESS.ELECTRICITY.TOT:
    get:
      tags: ["Access to electricity (% of total population) of countries"]
      description: "Get percentage of population with access to electricity of countries in the world."
      operationId: getAccessToElectricityPercentage
      x-ballerina-display:
        label: "Get Population% Having Electricity"
      parameters:
        - name: date
          in: query
          description: "Date-range by year, month or quarter that scopes the result-set."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: "2010"
          x-displya:
            label: Date
        - name: format
          in: query
          description: "Format of the response."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: json
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Response Format "
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: "Page number"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Page Number"
        - name: per_page
          in: query
          description: "Per page record count"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 50
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Per Page Record Count"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Population percentage having electricity of each country."
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/WorldBankResponse"

  /country/{country_code}/indicator/1.1_ACCESS.ELECTRICITY.TOT:
    get:
      tags: ["Access to electricity (% of total population) of the given country"]
      description: "Get percentage of population with access to electricity of a given country."
      operationId: getAccessToElectricityPercentageByCountry
      x-ballerina-display:
        label: "Get Population% Having Electricity By Country"
      parameters:
        - name: country_code
          in: path
          description: "Country code (Example- AFG, ALB, LKA)"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Country Code"
        - name: date
          in: query
          description: "Date-range by year, month or quarter that scopes the result-set."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: "2010"
          x-displya:
            label: "Date"
        - name: format
          in: query
          description: "Format of the response."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: json
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Response Format"
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: "Page number"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Page Number"
        - name: per_page
          in: query
          description: "Per page record count"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 50
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Per Page Record Count"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Yearly population percentage having electricity of the given country."
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/WorldBankResponse"

  /country/all/indicator/1.1_YOUTH.LITERACY.RATE:
    get:
      tags: ["Literacy rate, youth total (% of people ages 15-24)"]
      description: "Get literacy rate of youth (% of people ages 15-24) of countries in the world."
      operationId: getYouthLiteracyRate
      x-ballerina-display:
        label: "Get Youth Literacy Rate"
      parameters:
        - name: date
          in: query
          description: "Date-range by year, month or quarter that scopes the result-set."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: "2010"
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Date"
        - name: format
          in: query
          description: "Format of the response."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: json
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Response Format"
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: "Page number"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Page Number"
        - name: per_page
          in: query
          description: "Per page record count"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 50
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Per Page Record Count"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Youth literacy rate of each country."
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/WorldBankResponse"
  /country/{country_code}/indicator/1.1_YOUTH.LITERACY.RATE:
    get:
      tags: ["Literacy rate, youth total (% of people ages 15-24)"]
      description: "Get literacy rate of youth (% of people ages 15-24) of a country."
      operationId: getYouthLiteracyRateByCountry
      x-ballerina-display:
        label: "Get Youth Literacy Rate By Country"
      parameters:
        - name: country_code
          in: path
          description: "Country code (Example- AFG, ALB, LKA)"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Country Code"
        - name: date
          in: query
          description:  "Date-range by year, month or quarter that scopes the result-set."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: "2010"
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Date"
        - name: format
          in: query
          description: "Format of the response."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: json
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Response Format"
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: "Page number"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Page Number"
        - name: per_page
          in: query
          description: "Per page record count"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 50
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Per Page Record Count"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Youth literacy rate of the given country."
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/WorldBankResponse"
  /country/all/indicator/UIS.X.PPP.1.FSGOV:
    get:
      tags: ["Government expenditure on primary education, PPP$ (millions)"]
      description: "Get government expenditure on primary education of each country"
      operationId: getGovernmentExpenditureOnPrimaryEducation
      x-ballerina-display:
        label: "Get Government Expenditure On Education"
      parameters:
        - name: date
          in: query
          description:  "Date-range by year, month or quarter that scopes the result-set."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: "2010"
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Date"
        - name: format
          in: query
          description: "Format of the response."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: json
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Response Format "
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: "Page number"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Page Number"
        - name: per_page
          in: query
          description: "Per page record count"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 50
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Per Page Record Count"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Government expenditure on primary education of each country."
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/WorldBankResponse"
  /country/{country_code}/indicator/UIS.X.PPP.1.FSGOV:
    get:
      tags: ["Government expenditure on primary education, PPP$ (millions)"]
      description: "Get government expenditure on primary education of a country."
      operationId: getGovernmentExpenditureOnPrimaryEducationByCountry
      x-ballerina-display:
        label: "Get Government Expenditure On Education By Country"
      parameters:
        - name: country_code
          in: path
          description: "Country code (Example- AFG, ALB, LKA)"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Country Code"
        - name: date
          in: query
          description:  "Date-range by year, month or quarter that scopes the result-set."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: "2010"
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Date"
        - name: format
          in: query
          description: "Format of the response."
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: json
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Response Format"
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: "Page number"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Page Number"
        - name: per_page
          in: query
          description: "Per page record count"
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 50
          x-ballerina-display:
            label: "Per Page Record Count"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Government expenditure on primary education of a country."
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/WorldBankResponse"
components:
  schemas:
    WorldBankResponse:
      type: array
      items:
        oneOf:
          - $ref: "#/components/schemas/PaginationData"
          - type: array
            items:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/IndicatorInformation"
            nullable: true
    PaginationData:
      type: object
      required:
        - "page"
        - "pages"
        - "per_page"
        - "total"
        - "sourceid"
        - "sourcename"
        - "lastupdated"
      properties:
        page:
          type: integer
        pages:
          type: integer
        per_page:
          type: integer
        total:
          type: integer
        sourceid:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        sourcename:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        lastupdated:
          type: string
          nullable: true
    Indicator:
      type: object
      description: "Data indicator"
      required:
        - id
        - value
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          description: "Id of the indicator"
          example: SP.POP.TOTL
        value:
          type: string
          description: "Value represent by the indicator"
          example: Population, total

    Country:
      type: object
      description: "Represent a Country"
      required:
        - id
        - value
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          description: "Country code"
          example: CHL
        value:
          type: string
          description: "Country name"
          example: Chilie
    IndicatorInformation:
      type: object
      description: "Represent country population."
      required:
        - "indicator"
        - "country"
        - "date"
        - "value"
        - "countryiso3code"
        - "unit"
        - "decimal"
      properties:
        indicator:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Indicator"
          description: "World bank indicator"
        country:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Country"
          description: "Country"
        date:
          type: string
          description: "Date-range by year, month or quarter that scopes the result-set."
          example: "2016"
        value:
          type: integer
          description: "Country population"
          nullable: true
          example: 100
        countryiso3code:
          type: string
          description: Country ISO3 Code
        unit:
          type: string
          description: Unit of measure
        decimal:
          type: number
          description: "Decimal"
        obs_status:
          type: string
          description: OBS Status
